isis.stitle: EC-17 ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROLLER - ACOM FOR WINDOWS SOFTWARE - TITLE

svcproc.title: TITLE
svcproc.para: Title, ownership rights, and intellectual property rights in the Software shall remain in AlliedSignal and/or its suppliers. The Software is protected by the copyright laws and treaties. Title and related rights in the content accessed through the Software is the property of the applicable content owner and may be protected by applicable law. This License gives you no ownership rights to such content.
